column5: Hi Everyone,  I was away for the weekend on a course and we ran out of minnows yesterday. I have just received 7,000 minnows and have another 10,000 coming for the weekend.  Checking around the area it seems most dealers are out of minnows and most of the suppliers are not trapping many lately. It seems that their ponds are not producing many to trap and the high demand for minnows is strectching quite far as a result of the bait ban in the area.  We should be in good shape for the week and weekend. Moon's in Deseronto has minnows as well as Sandy's in Stirling.  Best regards, Sam
Thanks for the heads up, Sam. You're a good friend to this board. Our folks will patronize your business.

Thanks a ton Sam........ Just like Roy said..........you've got our Bizzzzz!!!!!! Sam, I'll be in tommorrow...I have those flyers ready........Hopefully you'll be in in the am....say around 7am........sometime early anyway, no work due to the cold weather. ..Pete
yep I will see ya later on  tomorrow for the night bite....hope there is some left for me.
